description.en: $TAILS is an ERC-20 token aimed to build a strong, game-based community. There is a TAILS emulator game built into the website and we are releasing NFTs that into the game that allows users to battle and earn ETH. We are creating a SEGA game alliance with other video game tokens, as well. Part of our tokenomics helps to increase our liquidity by adding part of sell transactions to LP!
